news.summary: Waymo's SFO win comes as the company faces criticism and concerns about safety in some of the cities it operates.

news.title: I built marshmallow castles in Google’s new AI world generator
news.summary: Starting Thursday, Google AI Ultra subscribers in the U.S. can play around with Project Genie, which is powered by a combination of Google’s latest world model Genie 3, its image generation model Nano Banana Pro, and Gemini.

news.title: OpenAI’s Sora app is struggling after its stellar launch
news.summary: New data suggests the app is seeing declines in both app downloads and consumer spending, as the early hype about the AI video social network wears off.

news.title: Music publishers sue Anthropic for $3B over ‘flagrant piracy’ of 20,000 works
news.summary: Originally, these music publishers had filed a lawsuit against Anthropic over its use of about 500 copyrighted works.

news.title: India is teaching Google how AI in education can scale
news.summary: With the highest global usage of Gemini for learning, India is emerging as a key market shaping Google's approach to AI in education.

news.title: Spotify’s new group chats share music with everyone in your circle
news.summary: Spotify is expanding its in-app messaging feature with group chats. Now you can add up to 10 friends and family members to your discussion about your new favorite song, podcast, or audiobook, as reported earlier by TechCrunch. news.title: Half of developers think gen AI is bad for the gaming industry
news.summary: While generative AI is being adopted at various levels of game development, a new survey suggests that developers increasingly think the technology is bad for the industry. news.title: Microsoft is working to rebuild trust in Windows
news.summary: Windows is in a weird spot. In its 40-year history, the operating system has weathered its fair share of missteps, but Windows 11 is testing the patience of its users in new ways. news.title: Waymo is finally starting passenger trips at SFO — but not to the terminals
news.summary: Waymo has finally broken through its SFO logjam. The company announced today that it will start offering robotaxi rides to a select group of passengers traveling to and from the San Francisco International Airport, a major step in Waymo's effort to increase its footprint in the Bay Area. news.title: An AI Toy Exposed 50,000 Logs of Its Chats With Kids to Anyone With a Gmail Account
news.summary: AI chat toy company Bondu left its web console almost entirely unprotected. Researchers who accessed it found nearly all the conversations children had with the company’s stuffed animals.

news.title: Nvidia’s Campaign to Sell AI Chips to China Finally Pays Off
news.summary: Beijing reportedly approved the sale of hundreds of thousands of Nvidia H200 chips to Chinese AI companies—the culmination of a dramatic shift in US tech policy.

news.title: Trump Admin's Plans for $500 Million USIP Building May Violate Court Order, Say Former Workers
news.summary: The State Department is poised to take over a building DOGE seized from the US Institute of Peace, former staffers claim—possibly for Donald Trump’s “Board of Peace.”
